description:
沪江英乐：当你的耳朵已经对快餐音乐产生厌烦时，当你渴望用洗涤灵魂的声音把你的耳朵叫醒时，那就来聆听英国创作天后歌手 Dido 再次现场演唱经典曲目《Thank You》，让她净化你的耳朵。

【创作天后 Dido 演唱经典《Thank You》】

歌词：

My tea's gone cold, I'm wondering why
I got out of bed at all
The morning rain clouds up my window
And I can't see at all

And even if I could it'd all be gray
But your picture on my wall
It reminds me that it's not so bad
It's not so bad

I drank too much last night, got bills to pay
My head just feels in pain
I missed the bus and there'll be hell today
I'm late for work again

And even if I'm there, they'll all imply
That I might not last the day
And then you call me and it's not so bad
It's not so bad

And I want to thank you
For giving me the best day of my life
And, oh, just to be with you
Is having the best day of my life

Push the door, I'm home at last
And I'm soaking through and through
And then you handed me a towel
And all I see is you

And even if my house falls down now
I wouldn't have a clue
Because you're near me

And I want to thank you
For giving me the best day of my life
And, oh, just to be with you
Is having the best day of my life

And I want to thank you
For giving me the best day of my life
And, oh, just to be with you
Is having the best day of my life

title: 创作天后 Dido 演唱经典Thank You

description:
伦敦国际华语电影节横空出世(点击查看完整文本)

在当下颁奖礼、电影节层出不穷的潮流中，首届“伦敦国际华语电影节”也横空出世。当地时间12月6日晚，首届电影节在伦敦威斯敏斯特中央大厅开幕。红星齐聚、英国皇室捧场、政要担任颁奖嘉宾——这到底是怎样的一个电影节？

南京大屠杀：一段来自美国牧师的证词(点击查看完整文本)

2013年12月13日是侵华日军南京大屠杀30万同胞遇难76周年。那么1937年的12月13日究竟发生了什么？我们可以通过一段来自美国牧师的证词来了解下南京大屠杀真相被披露的过程。
